channel.title: Ikeda on Misa's Odekake Blog

item.title: Tatsuta Jam
item.description: I visited Tatsuta Jam which was selected as the top five in the world’s Dalemain Marmalade Awards 2016. It is a lovely shop that has a cat design signboard. Unfortunately, the “yuzu marmalade” which won the prize are sold out in this season, so I bought an amanatsu marmalade jam. These jams are perfect for gifts because of it’s cute packaging and long shelf life.
